snippet.title: BATS the Game - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer featuring lots of blood and brutal combat for Bats the Game, showcased during Day 2 of Guerrilla Collective 2021. 

In Bats the Game, Scorpion Supreme has captured the members of Bloodsucker Anti-Terror Squad and locked them up in his desert fortress. With the help of his vampire powers, it's up to Count Bloodvayne to rescue his teammates and save the day. 

Bats the Game is headed to PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PlayStation 5.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
